title: 为什么我没办法玩？求大神解答
author: qw8385386
txt_content:
Error:Could not create the java Virtual Machine
Error:A fatal exception has occurred.Program will exit

我电脑用的是WIF7的求大神解答

replies.author: sweetapple
replies.txt_content: java的路径设置错误吧。无法创建java进程

replies.txt_content:
